Uses of Interface
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.IndividualSimulationMetric

Packages that use IndividualSimulationMetric 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics
Propagation metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.creator.individual
Diffusion metrics for each individual user.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.features
Diffusion metrics based on the user and information pieces features.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.features.indiv
Local diffusion metrics based on the user and information pieces features.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.informationpieces.individual
Diffusion metrics for each individual information piece.

  • Uses of IndividualSimulationMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics that implement IndividualSimulationMetric 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AbstractIndividualSimulationMetric<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Abstract class for representing global simulation metrics.

  • Uses of IndividualSimulationMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.creator.individual

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.creator.individual that implement IndividualSimulationMetric 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CreatorIndividualEntropy<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    For each user in the network, this metric computes the entropy over the users in the network who have created an information piece that has been received by the user.
    class  CreatorIndividualGiniComplement<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    For each user in the network, this metric computes the complement of the Gini distribution over the users in the network who have created an information piece that has been received by the user.
    class  CreatorRecall<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    For each user in the network, this metric computes the proportion of users in the network who have created an information piece that has been received by the user (i.e. supposing that all the received pieces indicated the original creator, this metric indicates the fraction of the people in the network that each user has discovered).

  • Uses of IndividualSimulationMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.features

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.features that implement IndividualSimulationMetric 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AbstractFeatureIndividualSimulationMetric<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​P>
    Class that represents an individual metric that considers the existence of several features.

  • Uses of IndividualSimulationMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.features.indiv

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.features.indiv that implement IndividualSimulationMetric 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AbstractExternalFeatureIndividualSimulationMetric<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​P>
    Abstract class representing individual feature-based metrics which do not take into account features that the user already knows (with already knows meaning that the user has the feature, in case of user features, or the user has an information piece containing the feature, in case of information features).
    class  AbstractFeatureKLDivergence<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​P>
    This individual metric computes the KL divergence of the priori distribution of the parameter values over the whole set of information pieces, and the frequency of receival of these parameters for a single user.
    class  ExternalFeatureIndividualGiniComplement<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Computes the complement of the Gini coefficient over the distribution of the features that the user does not already know.
    class  ExternalFeatureIndividualRate<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Computes the proportion of features that reach a user and are unknown to him/her.
    class  ExternalFeatureRecall<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​P>
    Estimates the fraction of the unknown features of a user have been discovered thanks to the diffusion.
    class  FeatureIndividualEntropy<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​P>
    It computes the entropy of the distribution of times that the different values of a user or information piece feature has reached the different users in the network during a simulation.
    class  FeatureIndividualGini<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    It computes the Gini complement of the distribution of times that the different values of a user or information piece feature has reached the different users in the network during a simulation.
    class  FeatureIndividualKLDivergence<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    This individual metric computes the number of bytes of information we expect to lose if we approximate the real distribution of features of the users (the total frequency of appearance of the features over the information pieces) with the estimated distribution obtained from simulating.
    class  FeatureKLDivergenceInverse<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    This individual metric computes the number of bytes of information we expect to lose if we approximate the observed distribution of the parameters received by the user with their prior distribution (i.e. how many times have they appeared over the different information pieces).
    class  FeatureRecall<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Computes the fraction of all the features that each user has received during the diffusion process.

  • Uses of IndividualSimulationMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.informationpieces.individual

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.metrics.informationpieces.individual that implement IndividualSimulationMetric 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  InformationCount<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Computes the number of information pieces received by each user in the network.
    class  RealPropagatedRecall<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Computes the fraction of pieces which were repropagated in the real setting which have been received by each user.
